entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Marathon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:20 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Marathon Airport 09:32 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -4.5°C
Pressure: 99.8 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -6.9°C
Wind: S 24 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Snow at times heavy beginning this morning. Blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
